champion: Gain a Sett. The first time your strongest Sett falls below 60% Health, he takes a break to do sit-ups. Each sit-up heals him 10% of his max Health and grants 45% Attack Speed and Ability Power.

Gain a Swain. Your strongest Swain deals 4% increased damage per 100 max Health.
